page.title: 13New Departures-magazine.
page.content: From his cottage in Piedmont, Michael Horovitz edits the poetry publication New Departures.The magazines are produced economically but contain a rich range of contributions-many,but not all,by well-known poets,writers and artists. A recent publication is 'A Celebration of /and for Frances Horovitz'(Â£2+50p p&p).Frances,who was married to Michael for 10 years, was also a poet and one of the country's most sought- after readers of verse.She died in 1983 after suffering from cancer of the ear. New Departures and Poetry Olympics Special anthologies are currently Â£1.50 each + 50p p&p. and avaliable from: {New Departures, {Piedmont,Bisley,STROUD,Glos. {GL6 7BU.
